information: Here's a bit of background about myself: I graduated from Mondale High School in 2022, where I was first introduced to basic web development in Computer's Applications Technology. I received 99% in my last year of high school for our yearly Practical Assesment Task that included word documents, excel, database and designing an HTML website. Since then, my passion has driven me to pursue a career in software development.

Over the past year, I've obtained a certificate for completing a 3-day photography course through RAD (Rise Above Development) and worked as a Customer Advisor at Sigma Connected (23rd March 2023 - 1st April 2024). In my time working at Sigma Connected, I was able to develop communication and interpersonal skills, along with the ability to work alone and various teams. As a driven and honest individual, I always strive to excel in any task that comes my way.

Outside of my professional pursuits, I am a spiritual dancer with a lifelong passion, having started dancing in church at the age of 4 years old and attend the School of Esther, a monthly program that young girls can attend at church.

I am currently a student at Life Choices Academy where I am completing a coding course. While I'm still a beginner, I'm commited to continuous learning and growth in the field. My ultimate goal is to become a skilled developer and make a meangingful impact in the industry and I'm excited to see what the future holds.

education.description: Matriculated from Mondale High School in 2022
Student at Life Choices Academy: 02 April 2024 - Present

experiences.title: Photography Course
experiences.description: Certificate received for completing a 3-day photography course.

experiences.title: Customer Advisor
experiences.description: Sigma Connected: March 2023 - April 2024 Position: Customer Advisor

testimonisals.name: Prophet Lizelle Adonis
testimonisals.testimomial: l, the undersigned Senior Pastor, would like to recommend Erin Caitlin Williams, who has been a member of the above mentioned church (Deep River Revival Worship Center). She has been fellow-shipping at our place of worship for the last 15 years alongside her family and has shown herself to be devoted in attendance and submission. She has been actively involved in Youth Ministry, Arts & Culture department(Dancing) as well as our School of Esther (Training school for young girls). Her interests varies from learning new skills & teachings, attending church services as well as a love for meeting new people. Dedication & commitment is her life motto, therefore I would recommend her for any task given as it will be accomplished as expected.

testimonisals.name: Melanie Ederoos
testimomial: In a world plagued by the influence of social media. It is quite rare that we are able to encounter something or rather someone who is true in their very nature and who under no circumstances conforms to the ways of the world. This description is exactly who Erin Williams is. A young lady who in all excellency, remains true to her very nature, remaining firm in her beliefs and values. Who does not compromise with truth, and living her life in love and compassion. Erin's greatest attribute is her ability to connect with others, creating a safe space for others to be themselves, yet not compromising on who she is. Erin is filled with wisdom, humility and a consistent drive to excel in all that she does. Her attributes have been portrayed in every area in her life. Allowing her to achieve great accomplishments. Erin is an inspiration to those around her, amongst her own peers and even those who distantly admires her. She is able to achieve anything she sets her mind to, as she exhibits true resilience. Erin is more than capable of achieving greatness and being a success in multiple facets. I have no doubt whatsoever that she will be prosperous in her endeavours, impacting lives as she tarrys along

testimonisals.name: Nosipho Precious Femela
testimomial: I confirm that Erin Williams was employed by Sigma Connected, from 23 March 2023 to 1 April 2024.

She had held the following position: Customer Advisor. In her most recent position, she had responsibility for contacting our client’s customers for debt collection, debt recovery, she provided customer service, handled customer complaints, dealt with billing and metering queries. She was a multi functional customer service advisor.

Erin brought forward good qualities on providing customer services and utilising CRM systems. She showed good judgement and acted like a mature member of the team. Her unconventional way of thinking helped the company to solve practical issues in the most efficient ways.
I would highly recommend Erin as I consider her a model member of the team who provided consistency and delivered all expectations.

testimonisals.name: Zaynurah Jacobs
testimomial: Erin Williams reported to me for just over 6 months and I can consider her as a strong and trustworthy individual.She is hard-working and takes feedback exceptionally well. She always strives to do better and be consistent in her performance in every metric set out by the business despite its challenging nature.

Erin’s Attitude towards her work and colleagues is admirable and I can indeed confirm her ability to make a positive difference within the work place, church and family.Erin has exceptional attendance and a true team player. It was an honour to have worked with her and as her manager it was an absolute pleasure having her in our team.

testimonisals.name: Pastor Nicole Davids
testimomial: Erin Williams has been a longstanding member of the Deep River Revival Worship Center. As her pastor, I have seen many examples of her tenacity and leadership capabilities. She has proven herself to be a diligent, purpose driven person of high values and etiquette. While she may have had challenges as any young person does, she did not let this deter her from focusing on her goals and pursuing them with tenacious drive.
Erin has shown moral character and sound principles when making life decisions, as guided by Her Parents and spiritual leadership.

She is a committed team player and has shown herself capable of receiving and acting on instructions without protest or delay. I eagerly recommend her for any position she may apply and know she will act with the best interest of the organization at heart, by adding value to the team she is working with. Please feel free to contact me if you require any further information about this character and person.
